sql.trim: a.id AS "id", a.company_id AS "company.id", IFNULL(company.name,'') AS "company.name", a.tenant_app_version_id AS "tenantAppVersion.id", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.tenant_id,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.tenantId", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.app_version_id,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.appVersion", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_url,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbUrl", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_password,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbPassword", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_username,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbUsername", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_name,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbName", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_port,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbPort", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.db_ip,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.dbIp", IFNULL(tenantAppVersion.is_locked,'') AS "tenantAppVersion.isLocked", a.is_locked AS "isLocked", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN org_company company ON company.id = a.company_id LEFT JOIN ten_tenant_app tenantAppVersion ON tenantAppVersion.id = a.tenant_app_version_id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gen_company_app a
1=1 AND a.id > 0 AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
